exelia.title: Software Developer
exelia.description:
•Development of a email campaign project consisted of a C# .NET 6 Web API, with React on front end, using Google Oauth 2.0 to Access Google APIs, Azure SQL Database and WebJobs for scheduled tasks and Azure Service Bus for message queue management. 
•Development of .Net 7 Microservices with Clean Architecture, CQRS and Mediator as well as MassTransit (RabbitMQ / Azure Service Bus wrapper), each microservice was deployed through CI/CD in Azure DevOps to Azure AppService that were exposed through an Ocelot API Gateway. The front end of the was written in Angular 16 and used a CI/CD in BitBucket to deploy the web app to Azure. 
•Development of a electricity resource management project consisted of a C# .NET 6 Web API and using HangFire for scheduled tasks, Angular 14 on front end,  Azure SQL Database and was deployed through CI/CD in BitBucket to deploy the web app to Azure.

arhs.title: Software Developer
arhs.description: •Development and maintenance of a project consisted of a C# web application with  ASP.NET Core MVC architecture, DevExtreme, jQuery and Vanilla JavaScript on front end, SQL Server as a database, .Net Core Web API for external exposure and a worker Console App for scheduled tasks, CI/CD on AzureDevOps and two-way integration of the main app to Azure DevOps for Work Items and Azure Wiki Pages.

freelance.title: Freelance Software Developer
freelance.description:
•Development of a solution that consists of a SSR Astro.js app along with Strapi CMS for content management and Postgresql for data persistance that are hosted in a VPS as Docker containers in order to present the services provided by a restaurant.    
•Development of a C# .Net 6 Blazor WebAssembly with MVU architecture, that integrated a custom HttpClient SDK that is used to manipulate, present and manage data in a NoSQL database, it was hosted using Azure Static Web App service and deployed through GitHub Actions CI/CD, finally I implemented a Two Factor SMS Authentication with OTP. 
•Development of a discord chatting bot with C# and Discord.Net for internal usage at a gaming discord server, API exposure to their existing site. and completed tasks requested by the server community and GoogleSheet as database. 
•Programmed simulations and visualizations to represent microclimate  changes for urban design and prove that the outcome would be beneficial for sustainability.
•Development of a project that is meant to be used for wedding invitations in digital form. It consists of a web app in Blazor WebAssembly, an API in .Net 6 and GoogleSheet as a database. It is deployed through Github Actions CI/CD  and it is hosted in Azure, the Web API project as an App Service and the client web app as Static Web App Service.

programmer.title: Programmer Internship
programmer.description: •Modification and programming of a fitness tracker chip board altering its functionality so that it can measure optical density on liquid solutions.

thesis.title: Master's Thesis
thesis.description: •Research on biodegradation of weathered polypropylene microplastic in marine microcosm environment.

internship.title: Engineer Internship
internship.description: •Completed my internship as an Engineer in Maritime Museum of Crete researching on degradation of building materials in coastal areas caused by the marine environment.

energy.title: Semester Project
energy.description: •Developed simulations and visualizations to evaluate the energy consumption and requirements of buildings based on different materials using python and matplotlib.

army.title: Army Services
army.description: •Completed my compulsary Army Duties as a paratrooper.

izmir.title: Exchange Program
izmir.description: •Took part in Erasmus + Student Exchange Program in Ege University of Izmir.

university.title: Enrolled in University
university.description: •MSc in Chemical and Environmental Engineering, 5 year's study curriculum.
